column4: what are the possible sources of a networking problem when using internet in a windows 7 os is possible, but in Ubuntu natty you can only access google?
why does it work on windows pure dhcp, when it can't work on ubuntu also dhcp?
also i'm using windows right now

check you have not seeing the cache, after that, check you have connected your cable to the card, after that, check you have the port open, after that, check you have a rule in your firewall for addressing traffic through the 80 port, after that check you are reaching the dns and the gateway, after that, if no one thing works, you can take a gun and kill a) your computer, b) your modem
